questions.question: What is the primary benefit of using Amazon SageMaker Model Monitor?
options: Automating the re-training of your learning (ML) models
Providing detailed cost analysis for machine learning (ML) infrastructure
Continuously monitoring the quality of machine learning (ML) models in production
Generating custom metrics and dashboards for machine learning (ML) workloads
correct_answers: Continuously monitoring the quality of machine learning (ML) models in production
questions.topic: 4.2 Monitor and Optimize Infrastructure and Costs
